name: Five-Spice Jasmine Rice With Portobello Mushrooms
keywords: chicken stock, portobello, rice, main course, summer
recipeIngredient: 12 ounces portobello mushroom caps, cut in 3/4-inch dice
Salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste
2 tablespoons finely chopped fresh cilantro leaves

recipeInstructions.text: Heat 2 tablespoons of the oil in a heavy 3-quart saucepan. Add onion, and cook over medium heat, stirring, until tender but not brown. Stir in the garlic and ginger, cook briefly, then stir in the five-spice powder.
Add remaining oil and mushrooms. Stir and cook for 2 to 3 minutes, then stir in the rice.

Add stock, bring to a boil and season to taste with salt and pepper. Cover, reduce heat to very low and cook about 15 minutes, until rice is tender. Remove from heat, and set aside, covered, for 5 minutes.
Fold in the cilantro, and serve.
